name: fabric-request
title: Fabric Request
description: This activity sends a Fabric client request
author: Yueming Xu

settings.name: connectionName
settings.description: name to identify a Fabric network to connect

settings.name: channelID
settings.description: the channel where the chaincode is running, e.g., mychannel

settings.name: chaincodeID
settings.description: name of the chaincode, e.g. marble_cc

settings.name: transactionName
settings.description: name of the transaction to invoke

settings.name: parameters
settings.description: comma delimited names of input parameters, using format name:value, where sample value represents the non-string type, e.g., 0, 0.0, true

inputs.name: orgName
inputs.description: name of the user's organization. default value is the client org in network config.

inputs.name: userName
inputs.description: client user name of the specified organization, e.g., Admin or User1

inputs.name: endpoints
inputs.description: one or array of endpoints of the target peer node, e.g., 'peer-0.org1.example.com'. default is randomly chosen from available peers in network config.

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.description: values for names of the transaction parameters as defined in settings

inputs.name: transient
inputs.description: name and value objects for transient data of the request.

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: result can be array or JSON object
